price: Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu huwakinga walio amini. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu hampendi kila khaini mwingi wa kukanya mema.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدَٰفِعُ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٖ كَفُورٍ
footnotes: Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu huwalinda Waumini na huwahami na huwanusuru kwa Imani yao. Kwani Yeye hawapendi wenye kukhuni dhamana zao, wenye kupita mipaka katika ukafiri wao kumkataa Mola wao Mlezi. Na Mwenyezi Mungu hamsaidii yule asiye mpenda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yudāfiʿu ʿani alladhīna āmanū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu kulla khawwānin kafūrin
